AlbumValidationErrors.DuplicateArtist: The same artist cannot be added twice. Please remove the duplicate and edit the roles accordingly.
AlbumValidationErrors.NeedArtist: В описании альбома должен быть хотя бы один артист.
AlbumValidationErrors.NeedReferences: Album needs a description or links for reference.
AlbumValidationErrors.NeedTracks: В альбом нужно добавить список песен.
AlbumValidationErrors.UnspecifiedNames: Альбом должен иметь хотя бы одно название на определённом языке.

ArtistValidationErrors.NeedReferences: Для артиста нужно или описание, или хотя бы одна ссылка на ресурс с информацией о нём.
ArtistValidationErrors.UnnecessaryPName: There is no need to add artist name both with and without the P suffix.
ArtistValidationErrors.UnspecifiedNames: Артисту нужно хотя бы одно имя на определённом языке.

SongValidationErrors.DuplicateArtist: The same artist cannot be added twice. Please remove the duplicate and edit the roles accordingly.
SongValidationErrors.NeedArtist: Для песни должен быть указан хотя бы один артист.
SongValidationErrors.NeedOriginal: Derived songs need to have an original version specified, if it's in the database, or the original needs to be mentioned in notes.
SongValidationErrors.NeedProducer: Song should have at least one producer (composer, arranger or animator) role.
SongValidationErrors.NeedReferences: Song needs notes, PVs or links for reference.
SongValidationErrors.NonInstrumentalSongNeedsVocalists: This song has no vocalists. Original instrumental songs need to be tagged with the 'instrumental' tag. Instrumental (karaoke) versions of existing songs should use the 'Instrumental' song type. Otherwise, add vocalists.
SongValidationErrors.RedundantEvent: The same release event does not need to be specified for both the song and album.
SongValidationErrors.RedundantRoles: Producer's roles do not need to be specified when that producer is the only one.
SongValidationErrors.UnspecifiedNames: Песне нужно хотя бы одно название на определённом языке.
